name: Bad Witches
description:
This game was made for GDQ One Mechanic Game Jam 5 Follow a journey of a witch to find her vampire boyfriend to settle the score with him! Beware! you might become very big or very small. Can your survive more than 10 waves?

Press D key for right attack 

Press A key for left attack 

Kill enemy to fill Special bar 

Hit enemy to fill up HP bar

Mechanic : Survival Theme, Trick or Threat, Evolution Using Unity 2018

credit : www.littlerobotsoundfactory.com for evil laugh male horror 2

: www.bensound.com for theme
